name: Automatically changing Stoic Notion Covers
description: Simply a collection of 50 notion covers with stoic quotes on them.In the automatic version, the covers will change automatically with each refresh (control/command + R) or when you reopen a page after some time.Both light and dark versions are available. Look best on all devices, browsers, apps, desktops mobile.For more dynamic notion covers, visit dynamicnotioncovers.com
